hero.description: Graduated in Software Engineering and currently pursuing a postgraduate degree at PUC, I believe in the power of technology to transform simple ideas into incredible tools.

about.title: Ylanna Almeida
about.summary: With 3 years of development experience, I use my creativity and technical expertise to create innovative solutions that simplify and solve everyday challenges.

currentProjects.description: Postgraduate studies in Fullstack Development at PUC

about.journey: My journey in technology began with inspiration from my brothers, who introduced me to the fascinating world of computing. From those early experiences, I discovered the charm of turning ideas into creative and practical solutions. I love the challenge of combining logic and imagination to build something that truly makes an impact and a difference.
about.closing: I am very happy that you stopped by! Feel free to explore my portfolio, and if you'd like to exchange ideas or talk about projects, it will be a pleasure to chat with you.
